title: Britain pushes tough tech rules under new digital watchdog - ABC News
content:
1. Britain pushes tough tech rules under new digital watchdog  ABC News
  2. UK government sets out plans to rein in Big Tech  BBC
  3. UK’s Big Tech regulator ‘to boost switching, cut killer acquisitions’  TechCrunch
  4. Britain to give new tech regulator statutory powers  Reuters
  5. U.K. Adopts New Tech Rules, But Without Power to Enforce Them  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Big tech companies like Google and Facebook parent Meta would have to comply with tough British rules under a new digital watchdog aimed at giving consumers more choice online
